about_the_game:
Reloader: test_subject is an experimental "Bullet Counting Reload Action" game that features realistic gun control combined with movie-style cinematics. We were inspired by numerous classic shootouts from movies and the indie game called Receiver.

Experience being a Reloader: having legendary shooting skills and engaging in Close-Quarters Combat(CQC). You just have to remember how to use the gun you’re holding.

Features

  • Manually control every step of reloading, such as loading the mag and cocking the slide to chamber a round.
  • Your faulty gun will keep you busy when it unexpectedly fails. Do what is necessary to get your gun functioning again, calmly and quickly.
  • You are responsible for knowing how many bullets are left in your magazine. Keep count and get ready to reload at the right time!
  • Experience tactical combat based on realistic situations that require problem solving.
  • Enjoy the unique art style combination of retro pixel graphics and futuristic lighting effects.

Synopsis

You woke up in an unfamiliar building. Your hands are tied, and a gang member is pointing a gun at your neck. Luckily, a woman passing by, who is a self-proclaimed spy, saves your life. But it seems like she has plans to use you as a test subject for a new, unstable technology.

The suspicious tool that is given to you grants you godlike aiming skills and the abilities of a legendary agent. Unfortunately, due to unforeseen bugs and errors, you have the ability to aim a gun, but you know nothing about how it works or even how to reload it.

But, you can figure it out step by step. Hold a magazine, load and lock the magazine into your pistol, and pull the slide back to chamber a round. Now, you are ready to fight.

All you have is a pistol and a few magazines. Now, get ready to escape a building filled with armed gang members - all by yourself!
detailed_description:
The Reloader Project

Reloader: test_subject is a free-to-play prologue of the Reloader Project. Reloader Project will be divided into 2 chapters: Reloader: subject_alpha and Reloader: subject_beta.

Reloader: test_subject is mainly focused on 'Bullet Counting' and 'Reload Action' which are the key points of the series. Look forward to various features that are to be added in updates!
